backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor file serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the CV file replacement task with high confidence, linking to test REQ-44 and multiple components including blob-storage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files, describing the portfolio structure including hero section with CV download, education, certifications, experience, and modal gallery components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, borders, and component colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic meta tags, title 'Jerry Osiobe Portfolio', and root div mounting the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the complete portfolio layout by composing all section components (Hero, Summary, Competencies, Education, Certifications, Experience, Research, Interests, Footer) in sequence.
frontend/src/components/CertificateModal: Empty file intended for full-screen modal component to display certification images with keyboard navigation.
frontend/src/components/CertificationsGa: Empty file intended for responsive grid gallery displaying 37 certification images with hover effects and modal integration.
frontend/src/components/CoreCompetencies: React component displaying nine technical competencies (project management, AutoCAD, cybersecurity, data analytics, etc.) in a responsive grid with icons and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Education.tsx: React component listing four educational qualifications in reverse chronological order, starting with MSc Systems Engineering (In View, 2026) through SSCE (2010).
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice for current year and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner component with background image, profile photo, engineer's name/credentials, contact information (email, phone, location), and prominent CV download button linking to '/assets/Engr. Jerry E. Osiobe CV.pdf'.
frontend/src/components/Interests.tsx: React component displaying five personal interests (Reading, Learning, Swimming, Travelling, Football) with icons in a horizontal flex layout.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalCert: React component organizing certifications into six categories (Engineering Memberships, Project Management, Data & AI, Cybersecurity, Process Improvement, Technical Courses) displayed in a two-column grid with icons.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalExpe: Displays a timeline of professional work experiences with company names, job titles, periods, and responsibilities. Includes a visual timeline with dots and lines for desktop view and card-based layout with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalSumm: Renders a centered professional summary section with a card containing a brief overview of engineering expertise, skills, and professional strengths.
frontend/src/components/ResearchPapers.t: Lists research papers and publications with titles and DOI links, displaying them in interactive cards with external link icons that open to the DOI resolver.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating and refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating that the portfolio uses static content without backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, typography styles, and utility classes including a grid pattern background.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH colors, container settings, border radius variables, shadows, and keyframe animations for accordions and fade effects.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking version 31 of a professional portfolio website for Engr. Jerry Ebruvwiyor Osiobe. Contains architectural notes, existing features (hero, summary, competencies, education, certifications, experience, publications, interests sections), and requirement mappings for a single-page scrolling portfolio with timeline-based experience layout and downloadable CV.
